summary: Now play as Mr Gibbs from Pirates of the Carribean
descriptionHtml:
I created Mr Gibbs as a playable character.... He is level 1 ( With full exp , so start as level 2 ) with only the Main Quest , Riverwood Trader quest and Faendal/Sven quest started .... You will start infront of the Guardian Stones .....You also get a free scimitar ( Yay .. coz trust me ...its rare)
Now with an optional save- Includes a Expert Robe and younger look for Mr Gibbs
Go kill a corsair or two !

P.S If the Save says that it relies on some stuff - blah blah - just ignore it , it was because all my mods were on ... NO it will not affect the save ... And if you see a dead body of Sven flowing down near Riverwood and see Sven roaming around in the village don\'t be scared .... It was a troll
author: EntoxBD

files.name: Mr Gibbs Save with Instructions for Noobs
